mapper.select: select account_name accountName,addr_right addrRight,addr_visible addrVisible,exp_time extTime,fwd,fwdauth,job_no jobNo,mobile,nickname,pass_type passType,passchange_req passchangeRreq,password,resetpass_mobile resetpassMobile,resetpass_general resetpassGeneral,unit_id unitId,is_new isNew,need_change_info needChangeInfo,need_change_unit needChangeUnit,need_change_password needChangePassword,creaded,synced,enabled,error,updated,last_updated lastUpdate from t_netease_account_customer where account_name = #{id}
